dmca.title: [TP-C330267T] DMCA Violation
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not
identify the copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed. 

 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Posted At: Tuesday, August 01, 2006 11:42 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [TP-C330267T] DMCA Violation
Subject: [TP-C330267T] DMCA Violation


From: abuse@theplanet.com
Subject: [TP-C330267T] DMCA Violation
Reference: [TP-C330267T]

For your review. 

Thank you, 

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc. 
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

MIME element (text/plain)
In accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (DMCA) you and
each of you are hereby notified that the website earth-accents.com is
violating our copyrights on their site. 
 
Specifically the following addresses
Earth-accents.com/walls.html
Earth-accents.com/bamboo.html
Earth-accents.com/classics.html
Earth-accents.com/rustics.html
Earth-accents.com/exotics.html
Earth-accents.com/adhesives.html 
 
I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, it's agent or the law. 
 
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed. 
 
Thank you in advance for any assistance you may provide. 
 
 
 
R. K. "Bob" Clark, Jr. 
Operations Manager
